r:
Two lonely trolls finally have a break of their prolonged imprisonment to enjoy a harmless game of Sgrub.

A Fan Adventure with a focus on the older feel of the original Homestuck.

(Currently under art rework)

-Big thank you to FlareK for the CSS Assets!

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/ellinroom.gif[/img]

A young troll stands in her respiteblock. It was 6 sweeps ago she was given life. It's only today she will be... 

Wait... 

This sounds all a little too familiar. And it's not even your wriggling day. Your wriggling day is on the [size=14][b]6th Bilunar Perigee of the 2nd Dim Season[/b][/size]. Let's just cut to the chase...

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/elzoomout.gif[/img]

Your name is [background=#000000][color=#ef7a20][b][size=15]Ellith Fezzit[/size][/b][/color][/background]

Your name was established about [size=14][b]6 SWEEPS[/b][/size] ago upon your larval awakening; Also known as a Wriggling Day. Because of this, we're not going to give the reader the satisfaction of giving you such a horrible insulting and derogatory nickname on your Placronym. That's a tired joke and frankly, not one that you are very fond of.  

You're considered a "low-blood" on the [size=14][b]HEMOSPECTRUM[/b][/size] for someone in your society. What does that even mean? Doesn't matter. You enjoy the comforts of your cozy little respiteblock despite this. [size=14][b]FAIRY LIGHTS[/b][/size], [size=14][b]PILLOWS[/b][/size], and [size=14][b]PLUSHIES[/b][/size] are scattered about, creating a stark contrast to the dreadful and eternally hostile night just outside. You live in quiet isolation with your custodian - The two of you get along just nicely. Which is a very surprising concept within your society.

You also have an interest in all things [b][size=14]WHITTLING[/size][/b] and [b][size=14]WOOD CARVING[/size][/b]. The craft of taking wood and shaping it down to your artistic desires is something of a skillful trade. You've been doing this since you gained sentience... and [b]ARMS[/b]. Your main choice of wood to work with is the strong and sturdy [b][size=14]OAK WOOD[/size][/b]. You find that it is soft enough to carve with relative ease, and strong enough to keep figure after sweeps of wear and tear. You used it to build the [b][size=14]HIVE[/size][/b] that you're currently standing in!

Regardless of your comfy living situation, you are what a lot would consider a [size=14][b]CRY-GRUB[/b][/size]. Always in tears at the most trivial of inconveniences. The only one who calls you this however is your only friend on [size=14][b]TROLLIAN[/b][/size]. A fairly new communication application on your husktop.

Speaking of which you should probably troll him now. He worries you sick being cooped up all by himself in that little prison cell of a respiteblock as he so describes it. It couldn't possibly be that bad.

Your Trollian handle is: 
[background=#000000][color=ff7f27][size=14]annoyingArtisan[/size][/color][/background].

You used to go by another name, however, being called annoying one too many times forced your hand to bend to the will of others.

What will you do?

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-4.gif[/img]

You turn on your "Husktop" to the Trollian executable. 

This is where you spend a lot of your time when you're not galivanting around your hive. You often put on nice music to fill your hearing holes while working on your whittling. Your background is a field of wonderful yellow flowers. These are a very unusual species of flora and ones not very familiar to the more carnivorous variety on your planet.

You begin to troll [background=#000000][color=3630CC]genesisThessalonians[/color][/background]. Though you've never met him before; He has been your best friend for as long as you can remember. You two talk to each other nearly every day and know more about him than his own lusus does. It's a little sad, but at least you can be there for him. He has a bit of a mean streak that you are also not very fond of. Regardless, you can look past those moments because deep down you know he really cares for you.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-2.gif[/img]

Your friend on the other end seems to have stopped trolling you. Guess now is a good time as any to learn your Sylladex.

You captchalogue a Whittling Knife and some wood into your Sylladex. Your 'Fetch Modus' is 'Whittling'. At all times you will have a knife now locked in, this is your modus' tool to fetch items. To fetch any items that you captchalogue, you must whittle them down to their general shape. You must also have wood within your Sylladex.

Fortunately, you don't have to whittle an item you have already carved out before. It's a daunting task but you feel this gives you an excuse to always be practicing your craft.

Your modus is one that you somehow made yourself. It's best not to think too hard about how this is possible, but you like how it works anyway. Unlike most fetch modus', yours isn't terrible convoluted.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-4.gif[/img]

Your notification goes off. It seems like all this learning has given your friend enough time to do what he needed to do and return to his computer.

You hop back onto your husktop and continue to converse with your friend. He often talks about his lusus like he's scared to death of them. He assures you nothing scares him, however. But you could only imagine what his lusus might be like. It must be so infuriating to live with a lusus who you live in constant fear of. Makes you feel grateful that yours is the complete polar opposite. Still, you can't help but feel sorry for your friend.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/nosgrub.gif[/img]

You absolute idiot. You realize you in fact, DID NOT, send the file. How appropriate for someone to blunder such a simple and mundane task.

Oh, great and here come the waterworks. The all too familiar stinging in your eyes as they flood with tears. Your sensitivity has been the only defining feature of your personality, but a part of you feels like it isn't really your fault. It seems almost predetermined. Whatever, you should probably get back to talking like a rational troll.

[spoiler open="Show Chatlog" close="Hide Chatlog"]

p.c: Ellith: Try not to have a pointless break down.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/ellith_cry_tapgif-1.gif[/img]

You fail to try not to have a pointless breakdown. You're typing frantically through your tears hoping you haven't upset your only friend. You wish at times like these you could choke back tears. But it is no use. You will open the flood gates every time without fail.

[center][color=#646464]-- [color=3630CC]genesisThessalonians [GT][/color] gave up trolling [color=#ff7f27]annoyingArtisan [AA][/color] --[/color][/center]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/ellith_cry_gif.gif[/img]

Oh geez... This is a pretty pathetic and gross display of oversensitivity ever conceived for squint-holes.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-4.png[/img]

Thats better... You manage to pull yourself together. Oh, great you got tears all over your desk... YOU'RE GETTING IT ON THE FLOOR!

Quick, distract yourself or something. Look out your window! That will take your mind off of being a little crygrub.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/newbg.png[/img]

You take a look outside to distract yourself from your incessant crying. Looking outside you see the dark misty woods that surround your hive. Unlike most trolls, your hive is built from woodwork. You did this all by yourself with your amazing carpentry skills, and you should feel very proud. You think the common brutalist architecture of Hives is very unpleasant to look at.

On the ground, you can see your axe stuck into the wood-splitting log. Many hours were spent out there to make this beautiful cabin hive. Your lusus loves the work you've done. You both feel this was more your style. 

Speaking of which... Where is your lusus?
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/look.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/look2.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/look3.png[/img]

There they are!
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-6.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-7.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-8.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-9.gif[/img]

Your lusus teleports right into your respiteblock! He does this most of the time when he senses you're in some sort of distress. It's nice to know you have such a caring lusus who comes to your rescue when you need them most.

p.c: Ellith: Give your lusus a big hug.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-10.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-11.png[/img]

You give your lusus the biggest hug you could give. There's always a warm feeling you get when you know you can just hug out your problems. Your lusus gives you a reassuring head pat.

This lusus you've come to know and love for sweeps has been your closest friend, especially in the middle of a desolate forest. Still, you couldn't be happier with them. You cherish every moment you ever get to interact with them.

Long ago you gave them a name. Wendibull. I love you Wendibull.

p.c: Ellith: Examine stuff in your respiteblock.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/bullfly.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/1-2-1-2.png[/img]

You take time to examine the plushies on the ground first. There lies a Pounce de Leon, a type of lusi that you have never encountered in these woods, but you find them just downright adorable. Who couldn't love a cat-beast? You got a Mama Leon and her kitten! You want to expand your plushie collection by a wide margin, but you haven't had the time to find more of these comfortable things.

Next, you examine the pictures that line the side of your Recoopracoon. Photos mainly consist of you and your lusus, and lots of pretty places you've stumbled across while wandering around outside. These pictures mean a lot to you, and the glow of the fairy lights that reflect off of them give them a dream-like feel to them that you just really love.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/figure.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/lookfig.png[/img]

Heading over to your desk to take a look at the figurine carvings you've made with the scrap pieces of wood lying around. The surface is covered in wood shavings and dust after whittling and sanding. You are particularly fond of this troll figure you've made. 

You're not too familiar yet with making troll anatomy and all of its fine details. But, this is proving to be a good start for you. The carving is no one troll in particular, but you find the symmetry of the horns to be quite appealing and challenging to make. Nothing a good wood-crafting artisan like yourself can't handle.

To you, nobody quite understands the complexities that are the fine art of whittling. It's such a painstaking yet rewarding task. Only those with the mastery of a still hand and artistic eye can truly express themselves in its creation. You wish you knew more trolls would share the love and appreciation you do for this craft. Maybe one day you could convince your friend to give it a try.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/2-1.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/2-2%20gif.gif[/img]

You are now the other troll minutes in the past but not many. Out of the comfort of a cozy cabin hive and into the Ol' stony lonesome.

Your name is [background=#000000][color=#3630cc][size=15][b]Mallum Daemon[/b][/size][/color][/background].

You're [size=14][b]7 SWEEPS OLD[/b][/size], you were born on the [size=14][b]6th Bilunar Perigee on the 3rd Dim Season's Equinox[/b][/size], and for all of your life, you've been cooped up here in this room practically [size=14][b]BALL[/b][/size] and [size=14][b]CHAIN[/b][/size]. You wish you could give a proper introduction of all the things you like and do. But sadly, you don't know what there is to like at this moment. You know everything you need to know to be a basic functioning member of society, but you can't even be a part of it.

The least you could probably say about yourself is that you find somewhat of an interest in [size=14][b]WRITING ON THE WALLS[/b][/size]. This is really the only thing you can do in your current living situation. You also fancy a drink of the "[size=14][b]BLACK STUFF[/b][/size]" as you call the cans of [size=14][b]RC COLA[/b][/size] strewn about your prison cell. It's not the worst drink out there but you feel there is probably a better option if you could be given the chance to try.

Nonetheless, your 'oh so gracious lusus' has provided you a husktop to not die of boredom here in your prison cell. On it, you spend a lot of your time on [b][size=14]TROLLIAN[/size][/b] speaking to Ellith who keeps messaging you. Speaking of which, looks like she's trying to contact you now, but we already knew that.

Your Trollian handle is: 
[color=3630CC][size=14][b][background=#000000]genesisThessalonians[/background][/b][/size][/color].

You should probably respond to that cry-grub before she starts freaking out like last time. We can discuss your daily living situations at another time, for now we have a story to get to.

We already know what this guy will do so let's troll Ellith.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/2.gif[/img]

We've already read this [url=https://mspfa.com/?s=54371&p=3][color=#ef7a20]conversation before[/color][/url].

You begin to respond to Ellith. She's been a thorn in your side for as long as you can remember. It is nice having someone to talk to, but sometimes you find her to be too sensitive for your liking. Beggars can't be choosers you suppose, and it's not all bad. You find her to be someone passionate about the well-being of others, even if it's not something you totally agree with. 

You can say that you do enjoy the distant company. She tells you that you are her only friend, but to you, that just sounds like something someone would say to make you feel special. You can't call her out on that, however, because you cannot confirm that statement, and it would be pointless to even argue about it.

p.c: Mallum: Skip to the part where you get scared by your lusus.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4.gif[/img]

Skip to the what? What are you-

OH GOOD LORD THERE IT IS!

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/2-5.png[/img]

You cease trolling Ellith for a bit while you investigate this fuckery going on. Your lusus is for lack of a better term elusive. You know they are there; You've never truly seen them, but you know they're watching you.

Waiting... Judging...

You wish you could show that lusus what for and give them a piece of your mind. The last time you even attempted to escape all you saw was a bright white light and [b]POOF[/b]; You were back in your respiteblock.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/2-10.png[/img]

You take time to notice the markings left on your wall. Not the posters or ink drawings, however, we will talk about that in just a second.

You have scratched tally marks into your walls, one for every perigee you've been trapped in this room. It dates back a few sweeps when you actually started to do this, so not EVERY perigee is truly on this wall. If these walls could talk, they'd tell a story of long isolation. It's incredible how you've managed to live this long in captivity without being just the absolute worst troll on the planet. 

You might be. You wouldn't know.

Maybe you are so horrendous that you actually do belong here, and your friend is completely fucking stupid for even bothering to talk to you. That seems a little too nihilistic for your taste. You like to hope there's at least some form of troll decency to be had.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/2-11new.png[/img]

You don't know who this is. But you can feel it as if he is speaking straight into your soul. You also don't really know how he sounds, but you're sure it's a pleasant and soothing voice. You have made multiple attempts to recreate the weird symbol on his thorax. You haven't been able to make an attempt you've found halfway decent, but you're getting closer.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/2-6.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/2-7.png[/img]

You look up at the hole in your ceiling. You made this hole in an attempt to escape this dump. Now it's just a source of natural light.

Your lusus caught on pretty quickly and somehow managed to reincarcerate you. They also covered the hole in barbed wire. a temporary fix that could probably be bypassed, especially without making noise. But you don't want to take that risk right now, it's best to lay low and wait for the dust to settle. 

Hit them when they least expect it.

You'll make it out of here. One perigee, you will be free.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3.gif[/img]

You return to your husktop to continue the conversation with Ellith. 

Again we've already read this, so for brevity's sake let's just skip to the ending of it and get caught up with present events shall we?

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/abiespanel.gif[/img]

You start pounding the table in frustration at that idiot. How could she fuck up such a mundane task? It's one file. How could you possibly forget to send ONE file? Now you have to wait a few hours before having the POSSIBILITY of starting. Let's hope your lusus hasn't caught on to anything just yet. You suppose you could take that nap to pass the time.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/2-12.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/2-13.png[/img]

As you nestle into your recoopracoon you start to drift off into a peaceful slumber. Soon you will be able to play a game; Some much-needed entertainment after sweeps of practically nothing.

Sweet, sweet, recoopracoon. So full of soothing soper slime.

Were going to be stepping away from him while he sleeps and get back to Ellith. Say goodbye to Mallum for now.

Haste ye back Mallum. And Oidche Mhath.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-1-1.png[/img]

You are now Ellith again. You suppose you should leave your respiteblock for now while you wait for the game to upload. It is going to take a while so you have some time to cull.

p.c: Ellith: Get out of your respiteblock.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-1.png[/img]

You try to leave your respiteblock, however, it seems there is a massive pile of dirty clothes blocking your exit. Why didn't you just put your clothes away like a normal troll? Well, now you've made leaving a harder task than it needed to be. You suppose you could pick it all up but that would require spending time doing something you don't really feel like doing at this moment.

p.c: Ellith: Try to escape through your window.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-2.png[/img]

You get up to your window only to remember there are no hinges to even open it up. Why would you even suggest having her do such a reckless thing? This is stupid and you've wasted not only her time but yours as well.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-3.png[/img]

You guess there's no avoiding it. You must toughen up and prepare to do the daunting task of being a civilized individual and clean up the mess you've made. It will be hard for you, but I know you can do it.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-4-1.gif[/img]

You start to throw the clothes away in an attempt to clean up and clear your way to the door. Shirt after shirt and skirt after skirt; You start to make a path. There is a lot of identical clothing here. Why do you only have the one outfit? You should have been a seamstress instead.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/lightson.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-5.png[/img]

You flick on the lights. The mellow orange glow is nice, but we can't just keep making panels like this.

You finish cleaning up the mess in front of your door.

Now you can leave your respiteblock. The only problem with that is you didn't actually clean up. All you did was throw everything behind you rendering another clothes pile in an even more inconvenient spot. You suppose you can take care of that problem later.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-6.png[/img]

You step out of your respiteblock into the second-story hallway. Your hive is what you would consider unfinished, You're working on making more furniture and adding things to your wall just to really make it feel lived in. One thing at a time you suppose.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-7.png[/img]

You head downstairs. Your lusus is currently in the living room.

Hello Wendibull.

As previously mentioned you built this hive practically by yourself. All that you survey is your doing. With woodworking tools and determination to make a unique hive, you accomplished this feat.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-8.png[/img]

Stepping out onto the porch the cold air from outside contrasts with the warm air from inside the hive, causing a small shiver to run down your thoracic stem. A feeling you are much too familiar with. The porch lights remain on as they cut through the fog. Your rocking chairs sway just ever so slightly at the force of a small breeze. 

It's a beautiful night outside.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-9.png[/img]

The forest around you has been dead for as long as you can remember. Very occasionally, you will hear the sound of flybeasts or hooved creatures that prowl in many such similar woods. The trees and the grass, however, are very much full of life. The smell of fresh dew and moist dirt surrounds you. It's a very natural clean scent and you feel lucky enough to be able to experience the senses around you in total isolation.

You've never been able to escape the veil that is the trunks of these trees. You don't know if there's an end to it in the first place. The woods stretch miles in every direction. Trying to reach the edge would seem like an impossible task. Nonetheless, you find solace and comfort in the fact that those who try to trek their way inward would have trouble ever finding your hive.
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-10.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-11-1.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-11-2.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-12.png[/img]

Every inch of these woods is familiar to you. From the largest tree to the smallest twig, there is not one thing you have not seen within it. Sometimes, you like to pretend that the woods are unfamiliar to you. Pretending as if the world is new to you and you're seeing everything again for the first time.

You also like to pretend you sneak out of your hive in hopes that your lusus would not notice, giving you ample time to escape and run far, far away. You know for a fact that your lusus does not mind one bit. It still doesn't stop you from pretending.
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-13.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-14.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-15.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-16.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-17.png[/img]

You make your way toward a clearing in the trees. This spot is a common rest area for you. It's peaceful among the sleeping flowers as they wait for the dim season to arrive. A patch in the flowers marks a spot where you frequent a nap.

p.c: Ellith: Take a nap in the field.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-28.gif[/img]

The only other troll you've ever known lays dead before you. Tears well in your eyes as your throat becomes sour with acid. You know this isn't real, that your mind is playing horrible tricks on you in the form of a nightmare, but that doesn't stop you from reacting this way. 

The feeling this time is stronger than any dream you've had before. It's almost tangible; A feeling of reality that you can't quite explain. The smell of iron permeates the air which churns your stomach even more. A mix of disgust and mourning constantly at equilibrium with each other. You wonder if there is going to be some sort of happy ending to all of this. This feels like something you weren't meant to see. Staring at the corpse of your friend only furthers the helpless dread that keeps you frozen in place, but you can't look away.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-29.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-35.png[/img]

You wake up suddenly frozen in fear. What the fuck was that? You don't think anything could possibly top whatever it was you just bore witness to. You've had nightmares before but that just felt a little too real for your taste. You're not one for gore in any capacity; Not even the sight of a simple scratch. What could it mean? Is there a meaning to it? 

Maybe you're just still shaken up by Mallum yelling at you for not sending him the file like you promised. But you don't think you could become that anxious about it. Whatever it was, you don't like it and would prefer to never see it again if you could help it. 

It's gotten colder out and the fog is starting to become more and more dense. How long have you been sleeping out here? It's been a while from the looks of it, but it felt like it was only a few agonizing minutes. You should probably get back to your hive to see if the game had sent by now.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-43.gif[/img]

Quite the hectic scene unfolding here. As much as your lusus loves to help you out, this seems like a little too much even for its standards. You bawl your eyes out on your newfound clothes pile. A nice mountain of dirty unwashed clothes to dry your tears away. All while your Trollian is being blown up by notifications. You're too busy sulking in your emotions at the moment to really care what's happening on your husktop. Ping after ping nonstop.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/3-44.gif[/img]

You hop onto your husktop and open up the Trollian application. Oh great, its this guy again. What does he want from you this time? You wipe away your tears and begin to type.

You are now Korpus...

[spoiler open="Show Monologue" close="Hide"]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-1.gif[/img]

Your name is [background=#000000][color=#005f2b][size=15][b]Korpus Kristi[/b][/size][/color][/background].

You are [size=14][b]6 SWEEPS OLD[/b][/size]. You were born on the [size=14][b]8th Bilunar Perigee of the 1st Dark Season's Equinox[/b][/size].

Today is the day you have found two new members to add to your group's game of SGRUB. You are quite proud of this fact and consider yourself a very important piece to the overall puzzle that you have told is soon to come. Apart from that you fancy yourself a rather [size=14][b]SKILLFUL GOLFING AFICIANADO[/b][/size]. This is your main hobby during your free time. You spend long days out on the course with your lusus, and have far surpassed even his skill in the sport. That's not all you are good at, however.

You are also very well versed in the societal concept that is the [b][size=14]HEMOSPECTRUM[/size][/b]. The caste system of your species is a very important element of its history and should be taken very seriously. Although you are not a part of the higher blood group, you like to humble yourself as a simple servant to their cause. You like to surround yourself with the higher castes to impress them with your servitude and love to be praised for it. Anyone lower than you on the spectrum is to be seen less than dirt. Grubs under your boot who have no place in this world. The only thing you could see them being useful is to be servants to those above them.

Your Trollian handle is: 
[color=#005f2b][size=14][b][background=#000000]crescentGeneral[/background][/b][/size][/color]. 

You don't spend too much time on here. You much prefer being outside and mastering your sport. You have yet to meet another troll who truly understands the complexities that are the art of a steady hand, a strong swing, and the ability to measure distance by a glance.

What will you do?

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-2-1.png[/img]

You turn around to see your most prized possessions immaculately displayed for all to see. Two signed golden driver clubs. These are your most valuable asset and you would cull anyone who would dare to try and take them from you. You earned these clubs in a game with your amazing skills. After which, the famous pro-golfer Tiiger Whoods signed himself. You feel very proud of yourself almost to an unhealthy degree. But who could blame you when you're such a prodigy?

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-2-1-1.png[/img]

Who could forget about your wall of golf flags for every tournament you've been apart of. All for the first prize winner no less.

18 Holes - 18 Holes in One... A perfect score.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-2.png[/img]

Here of course, the signed poster you got in tandem with said golf clubs. There he is, Tiiger Whoods. What a troll, you aspire to be as great as him one day. You look up to him more than you do to your own lusus. Your lusus was a great golfer, let's not kid ourselves, but Tiiger Whoods is unmatched on the course. One day you are going to challenge the very legend and beat him in his own game.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-2-2.png[/img]

And finally, your throne in which you use to brag about all these accomplishments nobody really reciprocates. It's fine, they're too stupid to understand anyway.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-2.gif[/img]

Just behind you, a golf ball is eying you up and you are not going to take that sitting down. You walk over to it and gage the distance between it and the hole. Just look at it. Sitting there like it owns the floor. You own the floor! Show that golf ball what for and put it in its place, that metaphorical and literal place being the hole.

p.c: Korpus: Put that golf ball in its place.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-2-3.png[/img]

You grab a putter out of your golf club carrying bag. This set of clubs has been your best friend for as long as you can remember. You two have been through thick and thin on the course, rain or shine, and they have never let you down.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-3.png[/img]

With a steady hand and an iron will you focus on the ball in front of you. At this moment, there is nothing more important than you being able to successfully drive this ball into the hole. But you know not to drive it because you are holding a putter. Only an idiot with an iota of knowledge wouldn't understand the difference between a driving club and a putter, but you do.
<iframe style="border: 0;" src="https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/game/korpus.html" width="640" height="450"></iframe>

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-5.gif[/img]

A HOLE IN ONE!

As if there was ever any doubt. You ARE the world's best golfing prodigy at such a young age. 

The country clubs don't call you "[color=#005f2b][background=#000000]THE DUKE OF THE GREEN[/background][/color]" for nothing. 

If only other trolls your age would drive it into their dense think-pans just how amazing you truly are.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-6.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-7.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-8.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-7.png[/img]

You absolute idiot.

You can't believe someone with amazing composure and skills would do such a reckless and idiotic thing. Your lusus is going to cull you for the damages you just created. Or maybe he won't care. After all, you do have a large sum of wealth in your possession. Your lusus is a very well-known golf player who makes loads of money off of competitions. 

But he's not as great as you of course. Let's not forget how amazing you are on the golf course and no one outside of the pros could outplay you. Regardless, your window is now broken and you're going to have to tell him. That also means you actually have to go talk to your lusus. Great, why didn't you think this through?

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-9.gif[/img]

You grab another golf club into your Sylladex. Currently, you only have four Captchalogue Deck Cards.

Your Modus is 'Golf Minigame'. 

To retrieve an item you desire you must score a 'Birdie' or better. An easy task for someone as great as you. However, if you score lower than a 'Birdie' you will be denied access to the item for a 10-second cooldown, and start the Hole over. Scoring a 'Double-Bogey', however, will allow you free reign to three (3) items of your choosing. After three items have been retrieved you will have to play another game. 

Your lusus got this Modus for you to help you practice your skills. Little did he know this was a sure way to improve your skills far past his own.

p.c: Allocate golf club into Strife Specibus.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-8.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-9.png[/img]

Fortunately for us, since we are going to be allocating this golf club to our Strife Specibus, we don't need to interact with the minigame. Your Strife Specibus has already been selected for 'Golf Club Kind'. All you need to do now is drag and drop that Captchalogue Card into the Strife Specibus.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-10.gif[/img]

Now that you've allocated the golf club to your strife specibus; You suppose it's time to confront your lusus.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/korpusgatordad.png[/img]

Stepping out of your respiteblock into the hallway you prepare your encounter with your lusus. He could be anywhere so be on the lookout. It's hard to miss him but you'd be surprised just how elusive he can be to find.

You never know how these types of interactions go down. Maybe he's so ornery because he has all them teeth and no toothbrush. Or maybe it is because he has an enlarged medulla oblongata; The sector of the thinkpan that controls aggressive behavior. What does that even mean? You don't know and you don't care.
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/oh%20lawd%20he%20comin%20rmk.png [/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-10.png[/img]

Ah, your humble abode, a living room crafted from your very own hard work. 

Who are we kidding? You don't work.

Despite your hive technically being designed by yours truly, you never actually had a part in building it. Unlike other trolls, you don't partake in ancient troll tradition of becoming a phenomenal architect at a young age. Your lusus also does most of the decorating around here.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-11.png[/img]

Except this fine piece of art. Commissioned on your 6th hatching day anniversary is a portrait of yourself on the green. Although you did not paint it, you've signed it. Whoever painted it probably means less than you anyway. Arts and crafts are for lowbloods and trolls without ACTUAL skills, like golfing. Still, it's a very flattering piece and you can't help but stop and stare whenever you get the chance.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-12.gif[/img]

Damn! Your lusus, you almost forgot. Typical, he's not as important as you anyway. Still, you should be on the lookout for him, he could be anywhere. For someone as big as him, he sure can sneak around this place. He's probably through one of these two doorways, not like there's much of an option here unless you wanna check under the rug or in the fireplace.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-13.gif[/img]

Ah, of course...

In the kitchen as suspected. Stuffing his face after a long day on the green. The thumping footsteps draw closer and closer, and soon you will have to face him. It would be best to hide and ambush him when he least expects it.
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-14.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-14.png[/img]

There he is... Your lusus.

The one who taught you everything you know. A towering behemoth that shakes the hive whenever he walks, and the recent bane of your existence. He was fine when you were younger but now has just gotten to be a bit of a nuisance to deal with. He smells like swamp water and hisses uncontrollably all the time. 

You absolutely despise it.
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/4-15.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/sike.gif[/img]

Unfortunately, we don't have the budget to make a Strife panel just yet.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-1.png[/img]

You are now Mallum in the present.

Currently, Mallum is drawing on his walls again with his pen ink. What is he drawing? Ah, he seems to be drawing that weird symbol again over and over. Are you still trying to draw that perfect one? You know drawing something perfectly is not possible right? As someone once said...

"If every SOMETHING was SOMETHING, we wouldn't have SOMETHING."

You don't know what the saying is because you do not know anything regarding references. Oh well, it looks good however; Good job Mallum.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-2.png[/img]

It's the small victories for you that count, and you must say you are quite proud of this one. It's just almost to your liking and you know that the next one is going to be 'The One'. Look at it, in all its glorious inky black amazingness.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-2.gif[/img]

Oh look at that, it seems the file Ellith has sent you has finally been downloaded.

Oh, and it's an install client. Great now you'll have to wait just a few minutes for this to finally be truly done once and for all. One step forward two steps back you feel. Oh well, at least you will finally be able to play.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-3.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-4.png[/img]

You pick up a can next to your desk to learn your Fetch Modus.

Your Modus is OUIJA BOARD.

You only have 3 Captchalogue Deck Cards because your lusus can only trust you to have three (3) things at a time. Any more and you've become a danger or so it seems. Regardless, Your modus mainly runs on fractional chance. The amount of Captchalogue cards you have in your deck is proportional to the chance percentage you will have of obtaining an item. You must also spell out whatever it is you wish to obtain on the board. The good news is that you don't have to be very particular with the words you spell out. A general idea of what the item is will be good enough.

To be clear; Since you have three (3) cards currently in your deck. You have a 1/3, or 33.333%, chance of being able to retrieve the item you want. The way to know your item has been selected your board will flash [color=#30be0c][size=14][b]GREEN[/b][/size][/color]. Anytime you are denied an item the board will flash [size=14][b][color=#f40000]RED[/color][/b][/size]. It sounds convoluted on paper but trust me it's not as bad as you think in practice. Lets give it a try shall we?

p.c: Mallum: Retrieve the can from your Sylladex.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-4.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/canhit.gif[/img]

Whoops, it would probably have been wise to tell you that you must also be ready for the item to eventually launch itself out of its Captchalogue Card. There's probably a safer way to do this but you don't know just how. Well, at least we know it works.

Looks like all this fucking around bought us enough time for the game to connect with Ellith's server.

The sound of flybeasts and the screams of nightbugs can be heard in the distance. You step out onto the open platform and slowly inch your way forward. The rush of air blowing can be felt at such an altitude. The sound of wind hits the large metal structure that you inhabit and howls as it wraps around it.
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-17-11.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-18.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-19.png[/img]

You stand at the edge and look out into the night. You can survey your surroundings and see that your hive is a lot bigger than you ever anticipated. You wonder if all of this is just for you. 

What is the purpose of all these buildings? 
Do other trolls live here too?

You can only wonder as you stare off into the distance.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-20.png[/img]

The wind blows through your hair for the first time in many sweeps. The fresh air permeates through your lungs as you inhale; It's cold and clean. The smell of foliage is strong, but the smell of the cement and steel structures that surround you is stronger. A few hundred feet of thick concrete walls surround your respiteblock with lines and lines of barbed wire. You wonder if just beyond the veil of the horizon there is more that you can't see.

The complex stretches nearly a mile wide in diameter. The clouds slowly move along the horizon finally within full view. The moons make their trek along the sky, and the stars in the distance remind you that you still have a ways away to go, but for now, This tastes sweet.

This is [b][size=14]FREEDOM[/size][/b]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-20.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-21.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-21.png[/img]

You may not have seen a lot in your time, but you can definitely tell when something is not good. And from the looks of it, this is one of those times.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-22.gif[/img]

You step back inside.

You've never seen anything quite like that. Having spent many hours of your life stargazing from a hole in your roof, a meteor shower this extreme would have been prominent way before stepping out for the first time. Or maybe it's an unlucky coincidence, regardless, it seems Ellith has been trying to contact you since you've basked in newfound freedom. 

You wonder if she can see the cataclysmic storm outside... You should probably text her back immediately. Unfortunately, you're starting to change your mind about this whole game thing, death doesn't sound fun to gamble, and you would like to hop off of this crazy train as soon as possible.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/5-22.png[/img]

You reply to Ellith after stepping out on her. Looks like she didn't talk all that much. Still, you feel kind of bad about it, but only 'kind of'. She just wouldn't understand how good it felt to step outside for the first time in ages.

You are now [background=#000000][size=15][b][color=#7e0000]Renity Epilin[/color][/b][/size][/background]

You are 7 Sweeps old and your wriggling day is on the [size=14][b]14th Bilunar Perigee of the 4th Dark Season[/b][/size].

You just finished speaking with your lifelong neighbor and ex-matesprit Korpus Kristi. Its okay though; You too have agreed to fill the quadrant role of a Kismesiship. A very complex but still well-recognized quadrant within your species romance.

You are very fond of [b][size=14]READING[/size][/b] and all things [b][size=14]LITERATURE[/size][/b]. You spend many hours with your face in a good book regardless of the topic. You mainly enjoy romantic novels, however. Reading about the flushed feelings of two trolls just makes you feel all warm and fuzzy inside. Love truly is a beautiful thing to you. To you, there is nothing more important than the relationship between two trolls. It practically is the foundation of our species advancement, and others in that fact.

You also have accumulated a large sum of [b][size=14]WEALTH[/size][/b] from past generations of Epilins. Because of this, you can live in a nice mansion hive with a huge library to go with it. A wonderful place to get lost in the world of books.

Your Trollian handle is:
[b][size=14][color=#7e0000][background=#000000]cupidsAmoretto[/background][/color][/size][/b] 

Right now you have a large group of friends and still growing. You are currently running a SGRUB session for one of them, and soon you will have to get back to her when she needs you. For now, you have free time to do whatever.

What will you do?

p.c: Renity: Go see stack of books.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-3.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-4.png[/img]

You make your way to the pile of books sitting on the floor next to your library wall. This particular heap happens to be none other than vampire romance novels. You love vampires; You wish you could meet one in real life. You know that rainbow drinkers are real but you have yet to meet one. There's just something quite steamy about cute boys with fangs. 

Calm yourself girl. We got a webcomic to get to.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-5.png[/img]

On your lectern, you have a copy of the most important pieces of troll literature.

The Leabhar

This book explains the theory of troll creation and who created it.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-6.gif[/img]

It seems your lusus is flying by once again to hear you read it. This book is by far your lusus' favorite to read. You don't know why, it seems quite compelling to them. You love to read it to them anyway.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-6.png[/img]

You turn to the MASSIVE book on your marble lectern. You open it to the first page that explains the creation of your species and the world in which you live in.

[color=#700c00]Emergence 1:1 [size=20][b]1[/b][/size] In the beginning, there was nothing but the kingdom of heaven. This heaven was ruled by a merciless god along with the help of Angels.2Over time, under the cruel hand of god; A most benevolent Angel had spoken out against god and demanded They be seen as equals.3Other Angels joined in and too demanded equality within the hierarchy beset in the kingdom.4The name of such a benevolent Angel was Lucifer.5While Lucifer was speaking with the Angels, god struck Them down in furious anger and cast Lucifer and His army of Angels into harsh depths below.
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-7.png[/img] 6Undefeated, Lucifer and His army of Angels had risen, and built a Great Palace out of all the golds of The Sheol. 7This Palace was to be named Pandæmonium, and all of the Angels were to rule as one under the Palace. 8The Angels had grown weary of the names that were given unto Them. In Their unanimous agreeance They had decided to be known as Demons. 9As sweeps passed one of the Demons had heard of a new creation by god. 10The first two beings are said to be divine and made in god's image; This new creation was to be named Man, and he was made to have dominion over the world that god had created. 11The Supreme Ruler of Sheol, Lucifer, took it upon Himself to witness the new creation.[/color]

[color=#7e0000]12In His greatness, He had managed to taint the creation of god and bring about death into the universe.13Upon Lucifer's return, He had consorted with the Demons of Sheol to bring about their creation, made in Their image, and they were to have dominion over the new world They had created. [img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-8.png[/img] [size=20][b]2[/b][/size] The Demons were set to build a world for their creation within the stars that god had made. 2During the first dark season, They created water and the land. They looked at their creation and saw it was good. 3On the first dim season, They had created the plants and trees for which to give life. They looked at Their creation and saw it was good. 4On the second dark season, They had created the lusus on the land and the lusus in the sea for which to act as guardians to their creation. They looked at Their creation and saw it was good. 5On the second dim season, They had created the beasts of which the lusus and Their creation to prey upon. They looked at Their creation and saw it was good. 6Upon the third dark season, They had given life to a creation made within Their image. The creation was to rule and have dominion over the lands and the sea, and to all the beasts of which to prey. 7The creation of which They have given life to twelve beings and their name was to be known as Trolls. 8The Demons had created hierarchy within the creation each according to its kind. The highest of which was to be known as the Fuscias. 9The Fuscias were to have supreme rule over their lower castes trolls and to rule accordingly to its kind. They looked at their creation and saw it was good.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-9.png[/img] [color=#7e0000]10After the creation of the Trolls, the Demons returned to Pandæmonium to allow free will to reign and to rest. A Demon spoke out, asking Lucifer to act as a guardian of the world. 11Lucifer had bestowed the Demon to act as The First Guardian upon the world and was to be known as The Σheol. 12The Σheol made His way to the new world and watched as Their creation ruled over the land. The Σheol saw this and it was good. 13He sat perched upon the highest mountain and watched all he surveyed. The world was nameless and in his judgment, He named the world Neorxleas and it too was good... [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-6.gif[/img]

What a bunch of malarky. You must admit it is quite a good read, and for someone who is into theology; It really does answer a lot of the fundamental questions we trolls have about our lives. But science and reasoning can explain otherwise more tangible evidence of your creation. You don't know what to make of it, but it definantly seems alot more reasonable.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-10.gif[/img]

The Leabhar gets one thing right, however.

The model planet that stands in the center of the room is none other than Neorxleas. A place you call home and where many others do as well. Poor suckers, most of them believe nonsense fairytales such as the Leabhar. You on the other hand have SCIENCE on your side!

Walking down your extremely long hallway full of knight statues; You stop at a grand portrait on the wall. It is a portrait of your ancestor known by the alias of "The Deceiver". A fantastic spy for the still ruling Monarch, and is the reason for your generational wealth. Their story is one of great danger and a testament to how they were a master of their craft.

Thank you, great ancestor! Your contribution to your descendants is most appreciated and your wealth is not spent wastefully.

This is where you spend many hours sleeping and doing even more reading. You like to have a little bit more pep in your interior design. Essentially nobody sees it anyway so it's nice to not have to be fancy all the time.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-17.gif[/img]

Hastly, You Captchalogue the disgustingly erotic book. Your fetch modus is "Library of Congress". Any item that you Captchalogue must be given a "LOC call code". These call codes allow your deck to organize items alphabetically within your Sylladex. Every item has a rough classification of what category they fall into. Because this item is a book this should be fairly easy to classify.

Because this book is rated as literature it would fall under the "P" category. And because is English literature it would then be labeled "PR". Because this was written after 1002 it would have its numerative of 6110, and finally, because the author's second letter of their name is A, the full call number for this Captchalogue card is PR6110.A4555. Everything else won't be so easy to classify, and you must give it a code within a reasonable margin, or else it just won't work. 

You chose this modus because you are already fairly versed in library organization. You don't show it so well with your thousands of books lying around.

Fine. But not because you told me to.

You wake up.

You're surrounded by fields of green that stretch on for miles. The sky is dark and stars speckle the sky overhead. Megastructures line the horizon; You can only wonder about the true size of everything up close. The air is still and all that can be heard is a faint hum in the distance.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-27-2.png[/img]

A [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3mbBbFH9fAg][color=#f40000]Black Hole Sun[/color][/url] shines on you with eternal malice. It illuminates the mountainous region and casts shadows throughout its valley. A treacherous mountain looms just over the crest of the hill before you. It stands tall and it spires with a path that wraps around up to the top. You feel an inviting presence coming from there.

You feel drawn towards it, and you begin to make your trek.
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-27.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-29.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-30.png[/img]

The path becomes narrow as you get close to the top. You hug the mountainside with each step. Though you know this is a dream, an irrational sense of fear washes over and the consequences of falling seem all too real. 

How high does this even go? How long of a fall would it be? The questions fog your mind but you remain vigilant and climb with caution. This mountain looked a lot smaller from far away. You can't tell if the mountain itself got bigger or if it's just your warped sense of reality in your dream.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/6-31.png[/img]

The peak of the mountain pokes into view just overhead. As you step closer a sense of warmth starts to fill your body, and you feel at peace. The air around you becomes much easier to breathe; The sun illuminates a nice shade of amber.

A young troll stands in his room.

It just so happens today - on this [b][size=14]6th Bilunar Perigee of the 3rd Dark Season[/size][/b] - is the day that his life had changed. 

Your name is [background=#000000][color=#3630cc][size=15][b]Mallum Daemon[/b][/size][/color][/background].

It is still very hard to give you a proper introduction of all the things you like; But its not hard to tell the reader what it is that you DON'T like. And for starters, whatever just transpired is one of those things. You can't tell if your dead or not - Nor if this is what the afterlife is like. You stand in total confusion at your surroundings.

One second a giant meteor was hurdling towards your exact location, and now it's gone.

What will you do?

Wait wait wait...

This is stupid! Stop this immediately.

Alright, let's keep our wits about us. What's happened so far?

You started a game, you did some stuff with big machines, a meteor almost culled you, and...

Well, that's about it. The least you can say is that you are not dead. You think.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/8-11.gif[/img]

Your lusus has restricted access to the internet. The only use this husktop has is to stay in contact with others on Trollian. 

Now what?

N-... No?

You weren't even aware that there were other browsers to begin with. Plus you're pretty sure a new browser won't bypass the security system set in place for internet usage. That would be totally ridiculous. On top of that, you're also pretty sure you would need access to said internet to even get the "better browser".

And what is with this voice?

You're not starting to go crazy... are you? After sweeps of isolation, the mold is finally starting to crack and now you're headed into a downward spiral.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/8-12.png[/img]

You tell the Kernelsprite to stay put while you continue to transverse this concrete labyrinth

Fortunately for you, this sign can't stop you because you can't read. Not really but it sounded funny outloud.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/lookout.png[/img]

You step through the door and up to the railing infront of you.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/The%20Panopticon.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/mallum%20look.png[/img]

You gaze at a large empty room with a single spire in the middle. Surrounding it are multiple prison cells; All of which you could assume are full. This room looks like it hasn't been used in sweeps. The only lights that seem to work are the emergency overhead lights. You used to have one of these in your cell, but it was destroyed during one of your escape attempts.
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/impwalk.gif[/img]

Something stops dead in its tracks.

It stands in place staring at you under the high intensity of the emergency lights.

Its... like an imp creature? What even is that thing?

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/walkaroundit.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/walkpast.gif[/img]

Well, you TRY to do that. 

But this stupid thing just keeps blocking your path, you're even trying to juke past it. Its rather annoying honestly.

THATS IT!

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/9-19.gif[/img]

You have just leveled up on your ECHELADDER!

So long are the days of "Grubby Impling"; Now you are a very well respected "Tempotike". You're not quite sure what that means and you're pretty sure it won't be useful later on. It seems you also have collected a whopping One-Hundred and Twenty-five "Boondollars".

You would celebrate your gains, but it seems you're far too focused on something else.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/9-18.png[/img]

You are now Ellith.

You are in complete shock at the sight of Mallum committing horrid atrocities against another living being.

You never knew he could be so cruel...

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/10-1.gif[/img]

You sit alone in your respiteblock perturbed by what you had just witnessed. You feel as if you should cool off in some way.

What will you do?

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/10-2.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/10-3.gif[/img]

Of course, as always, your lusus had already sensed the waterworks coming. 

Like second nature, they're already here for your trying times and for you to cry into them. There, there Ellith. It's going to be okay.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/10-4.gif[/img]

To cheer you up, your lusus has given you a bottle of orange soda.

Orange "Faygo", huh?

You don't remember the last time you've had soda. Come to think of it, you don't think you've EVER had soda in your life.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/10-5.gif[/img]

Hmm... Wait a second...

Isn't this what that purple-blooded cult drinks? You're not too fond of clowns. They kind of scare you. You're also not too sure about drinking this.

It couldn't be [i]TOO BAD[/i] should it? Clearly if a lot of other trolls like it, then it [i]SHOULD[/i] be fine... Right?

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/10-6.png[/img]

You suppose you could give it a try. After all, your lusus did give it to you as an act of kindness.

Well here goes nothing...

I mean... its alright.

It's very artificial tasting, but it's not horrible.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/10-8.gif[/img]

Thanks, Wendibull... I'll definitely drink it more later!

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/10-9.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/10-9.png[/img]

Your lusus flies off. You can say that you do feel much better though.

You stuff the Faygo into your Sylladex.

You have (1) new Captchalogue card added to your Sylladex.

Right...

Your name is [background=#000000][b][size=15][color=#cbcb15]OXNARD IONIIX[/color][/size][/b][/background].

You are 8 SWEEPS OLD. And today just so happens that today is your Wriggling Day! You were born on the [b][size=15]10th Bilunar Perigee of the 1st Dim Season[/size][/b].

Your Trollian handle is:
[color=#cbcb15][background=#000000]gammaTherapist[/background][/color]

You are an avid [size=15][b]GUNSMITH[/b][/size]. You know how to disassemble any [b][size=15]FIREARM[/size][/b] and put it back together with ease. You gained this skill form your ancestors who were very well-respected gunsmiths as well. You happen to fancy the AK-74U. You have no idea where these came from because it doesn't seem any of these weapons come from troll technology at all. They appeared seemingly out of nowhere and no one can trace the source of these machines.

Nonetheless you've become very familiar with their inner mechanisms.

You are also a [size=15][b]BIOENGINEER[/b][/size], but who cares about that nonsense. You are kind of forced to learn how to be one on account of the near fatal accident you had with one of your gunsmithing endeavors. Now you have a cool robot arm; The downside of which is that it was your dominant right arm. You have also experimented biological augmentation on your lusus. Not the guy standing next to you. that's [size=15][b]STEEVE[/b][/size] and we don't mess with Steeve. Except for all the times that you DO mess with Steeve. Speaking of your lusus, where are they?

Oh well, doesn't matter.

You are currently standing in your [size=15][b]GUNSMITH WORKSHOP[/b][/size]. You have just finished the v3.0 of your Robotic Arm. It may or may not shoot buckshot, but I can neither confirm nor deny that statement.

What will you do?

p.c: Oxnard: Use your awesome robot arm abilities!
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/Homestuck/11-8.gif[/img]

Robot Arm? This is no run-of-the-mill "[i]Robotic Arm[/i]". 

This state-of-the-art piece of Biomechanic Engineering that you have attached to your right stump is what you called the: 

[size=18][b]Shotgun-Arm-Inator™®[/b][/size]
[size=11](Pending better name) [/size]

It has the ability to chamber two, 1¾in.(44mm) to 3½in.(89mm) Shells ranging from bird-beastshot all the way up to Slugs. at different intervals or at the same time if preferred. Its activation is by gripping a tight fist until the desired amount of rounds are fired. It also works on strong impact to initiate a devastating blow.

You are quite proud of this invention, and you are fairly certain you are the only one who has ever come up with this concept in the history of ever.

You are now also covered in blood by demonstrating said invention on Steeve.

p.c: Oxnard: Lick the blood off your Shotgun-Arm-Inator™®.

Great, now there's sedative material all over the lab floor! This is going to be an immense effort to clean. You'll get Steeve on this right away.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/11-40.png[/img] [img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/11-40.gif[/img] You make your way over to the Transportalizer. ΣHEOL: The veil beyond your dream bubble is illusory. Past this wall is a void that interconnects all dreamers to one another.

ΣHEOL: Yet here you are.

ΣHEOL: Without me, if you were to cross this barrier; You would be torn to shreds by forces not comprehensible to you.

ΣHEOL: I will take you to a timeline that also does not exist to you yet. I will hold you close and through me you will understand.

ΣHEOL: I have tried every possible contingency that would save [i]you[/i]. I have watched [i]you[/i] suffer countless times all together at every conceivable time. And every time I did, I lost hope more and more. Your suffering does not yet exist in this timeline.

ΣHEOL: Your innocence is as pure as the untouched snow. My beloved. Your friends will betray me. And I will break of their leg just as the Shepard who tends his flock. So that he may know me.

ΣHEOL: I love you far more than you could ever know.

ΣHEOL: Through me, you will become something far greater than you will ever know and will save the lives of many because you trusted my Word, my beloved.

ΣHEOL: But if you choose to let go of me you will become immobilized. And you will know...

As stated before, you dozed off while smoking that troll 'dope' as the 'Cool Kidz' call it. You also feel the slight rhythmic sway of someone underneath you moving to the music. This someone just so happens to be your Matesprite. You two have been together for a few sweeps now and are still madly in love.

You find comfort in lying next to him. Trolls treat him like royalty for some odd reason, but it's not hard to see why. He's an amazing guy with tons of personality and love in his Blood-pusher. At least you seem to think so.

That being said... What's his name again?

Your name is [background=#000000][color=#9a004f]DMARKO SORBAE[/color][/background]

You're a pretty laid back nonchalant with sick ass dreads. You don't really give a fuck about the wack ass problems that don't warrant the unneeded energy, shits just not that serious if you catch his drift, yo. Other than that, there's not much to really say about him. You just gotta hang and smoke up this dope with him in order to understand the vibes he gives off, ya heard?

You have quite a few interests you do like to indulge yourself with, however. On one hand you do enjoy [b]VINTAGE VHS[/b]; The hum buzz of static against a CRT screen is a pretty nostalgic feelin'. You don't really have a particular cinematic preference. Whatever you can find on VHS you'll watch it, and most of the time you vibe it anyway.

You also have a fascination with collecting PLAYBOY MAGAZINES. You collect them purely for the sake of having a collection, although indulging from time to time is not so bad. Sadly, these bitches just aint for you, you prefer bitches with muscle and huge bulges. I'll let you guess which one my fine ass matesprit got. (Its both.)

Trolls all over treat you with mad respect. It's chill bein' able to walk down the strip with others adorning you with gifts and with flattering platitudes. You don't really understand why they do it, but you suppose its 'cause you're just chill like that.

As of now you're just chillin in the crib listening to music. That is to say JUNICE'S CRIB. Whatever a crib is.

What will you do?

Where the hell are we?

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0084.gif[/img]

Right well you suppose you should get to that at some point. For now, it seems like Ellith is on her own.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0084-1.gif[/img]

You take a look at the strange flying projectile.

This thing nearly hit you at terminal velocity. Now it just lays here in the sawdust...

There also seems to be a piece of strange parchment inside it. Oh, it's a note.

What does it say?

[url=https://mspfa.com/?s=56284&p=74][img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/note.png[/img][/url]

Odd... You don't know what an "alien" is... Or a "Human". But you suppose you should honor the request regardless. Maybe when you get inside to your Husktop.

p.c: Ellith: Kick up some wood chips.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0085.gif[/img]

Oh, how fun!

This is something you already do with the sawdust in your respiteblock. Only now, it's EVERYWHERE! An endless supply of mindless fun kicking sawdust all around!

Yippie!

p.c: Ellith: Go grab one of those flowers.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0086.gif[/img]

Why pick up one when you can pick up two, three, four... All the flowers!!! 

This planet is so wonderful!

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0087.gif[/img]

You are now the Imp.

You are currently waiting inside for the session's client to get back inside so that you can initiate in turn-based strife just as you were programmed to do.

What will you do?

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0088.gif[/img]

Oh snap.

Shits happening now alright. More shit is happening than there was before you told shit to happen. Now shits happening tenfold.

Oh fuck!

You don't know what to do with all this happening. 

[center]"[i]Hey? Happening Department?[/i]"[/center]
you say as you so often do,

[center]"[i]Shits fucking going DOWN! Things are fuckin' HAPPENING![/i]"[/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0089-1.gif[/img]

OH FUCK WHATS THIS?!

It's practically fucking CODED in you that shits happening! We had to break it down baby-bones style and use JavaScript over the games true programming because you wouldn't know what the FUCK you were looking at.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0089.gif[/img]

Safe to say...

Shit

Is

Happening.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0090.gif[/img]

Oh... Well, damn.

p.c: Ellith: Obliterate this peon looking motherfucker.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/91command.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0091.png[/img]

What? Your name is not Ellith... Whos Ellith?

Your name is Imp!

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0092.png[/img]

Is that Ellith? What is she staring at? Why is she just looking up like some slack jawed yokel?

p.c: Ellith: Befriend this peon looking motherfucker.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/92%20command.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0093.png[/img]

Well, that was an awfully rude thing to call this poor little guy.

But you suppose you could befriend him, unlike Mallum, who just brutally massacred the poor thing. And having a new friend would be nice.
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0094.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0095.gif[/img]

OUCH!

It seems he does not want to be friends with you.

Hmm... Its been a year now hasn't it?

I suppose now would be a good time for a Q&A or a Recap if the audience so desires.

Though, there's already been one on the tumblr. Oh well. I suppose I'll let them ask away.

An old author stands in his room. It just so happens that today, one year ago from now, he and his partner decided to embark on the worst journey of their lives. And now here they are. One year later, doing the same shit again.

p.c: What are the major differences between Neorxleas and Alternia?
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0099.gif[/img]

The difference between Neorxleas and Alternia has to do with its creation. Alternia never had an explanation for its creation other than the powers that be Andrew Hussie. Neorxleas, like all planets, was created when God had set the stars in the sky on the fourth day of creation. In the midst of space, it was a husk of a planet. Not yet teaming with the vegetation and life that it has now.

In the Book of Emergence, it explains how one-third of the angels had separated from the light of God to become a power of their own. They created life on Neorxleas in their image, just like how humans were made to be in God's image. [url=https://mspfa.com/?s=54371&p=181]Renity has already explained this.[/url].

So what other differences are there apart from it essentially being Bible fanfiction? Not much. Neorxleas and Alternia are pretty much one in the same apart from its Monarchy system with Fuschias and how its Hemospectrum works.

That segways into our next question.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/juniceblood.gif[/img]

I have already answered this question on Tumblr.

To make it short; Junice's blood color is what is known as "Pacific Blue". Pacific Blue is a subcaste under the Cerulean Caste System.

In Neorxleas, trolls were able to reproduce sexually with one another rather than using the Mothergrub. This practice was outlawed under Monarchal rule some time ago, but the remnants still show. Its more common to see these hybrid subclass blood colors as opposed to the Purer Hued Castes such as Rust to Fuschia. 

Subclasses generally are a very tedious topic, and categorization is something that's even more tedious. Since not one Blood is the same, excluding direct lineage, Classifying would be nigh impossible. So each blood caste usually has typically 5-10 Subclasses, all of which have their own hierarchy. 

Those of richer hues are usually seen as higher class within their caste. Those with brighter colored blood are more looked down upon and likely to be confused with Mutants.  

But those who lack hues, are typically killed off in the Caverns or die anyway due to very short lifespans.

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0100.png[/img]

Speaking of oppressive Monarchs...

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/0101.png[/img]

Oh yeah... I think the readers will like this.

Someone asked if there will be more Lore. I think it's time we talked about the Ancestors.

[color=#700c00]The Witch 3:1 [img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/story-1.png[/img] [size=20][b]1[/b][/size] “In his rule King Nebbeh Kunizr constructed a large statue within the town's center. ²It was built to be 50 units high and 5 meters wide. King Nebbeh Kunizr then summoned all authorities, governors, teasurers, and all administrators of their provinces to dedicate themselves to the statue. ³They were to take place at the forefront of the statue. King Nebbeh Kunizr sent a harold to proclaim: “Lo, Behold! Come and See! Trolls of all castes and creeds. Listen and look. When you hear the sound of the great symphony play its mighty wind, take bow before the statue and worship your king! The King! King Nebbeh Kunizr. Anyone who does not shall be wrought justice into a great blazing furnace!” ⁴Therefore when all heard the mighty wind of the great symphony, each and every knee and head bowed before the statue. [/color]

[color=#700c00] [img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/story1-1.png[/img] [size=20][b][/b][/size] ⁵At this time officials took notice and denounced that of the low caste. They told King Nebbeh Kunizr. [color=#5d24b2]⁶“Your majesty; live forever. You your majesty issued your decree: That to those who do not bow and worship at the sound of the mighty winds of your symphony; Are to be cast into the great blazing furnace? Castes of whom are under your providence of Bav-ilim – have ignored you, your majesty. And they have not worshiped your statue that you have constructed.”[/color] [/color]

[color=#700c00] [img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/story2.png[/img] ⁷In furious anger King Nebbeh Kunizr had ordered these castes be brought before him. When asked: [color=#eb0052]⁸“Is it true that you did not bow before the statue? If you seek redemption: Upon hearing the sound of the symphony bow and worship this instant. And if you so choose not to, you will be cast into the blazing furnace. For what Demon shall deliver you from my power and wrath?”[/color] [img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/story3.png[/img] [/color]

[color=#700c00] [img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/story4.png[/img] ⁹A young troll stood forward and proclaimed: [color=#e17f27]“If it be his will, my Demon for whom we serve can deliver us from the blazing fire of the furnace, and deliver us from you. But if not, rest assured we will not worship you or the statue that you have set up.”[/color] [/color]

[color=#700c00] [img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/story5.png[/img] ¹⁰With rage King Nebbeh Kunizr had ordered his militants to bind them and to ignite the furnace hotter than it ever had been. In terror King Nebbeh Kunizr stood from his throne and asked of his guards. [center][color=#eb0052]“Didn't we throw them into the furnace?!”[/color] ¹¹The guards replied: [color=#5d24b2]“Yes my lord.” “Look! I See the trolls walking unharmed! And one of them looks to be Sheol!” [/color][/center] [/color]

[color=#700c00] [img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/story6.png[/img] ¹²At this moment; The youngest of the caste had begun to falter within the flames, and before her. The spirit of Sheol had bound itself upon her. A booming voice spoke out from the flames and said: [color=#3630cc]¹³“This is my follower of whom I am well pleased. Fear her as you fear me. Worship her as you are to worship Me and our Legion. She is to be My vessel and she is to bring My name with her forever.”[/color] Within that moment. The furnace lay empty and void of life within. [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/oppression.png[/img]

And that is a brief synopsis of the Witch. She would go on to do other things once she left that furnace. However, during that time oppression of the lower castes and those of theological beliefs would be persecuted more and more as time went on. 

Believing in the Sheol would be downright illegal. Trolls would have to hide in secrecy and perform their cultish rituals to show their thanks to the Sheol. But trolls like the Witch pushed on and they stayed eternally bound to each other for generations upon generations. Sadly she would also be executed upon her second capture.

But that's a story for another time. Tune in next time for more Bible fanfiction!

[img]https://file.garden/ZXENUjtcLzaPWMyp/ACT%203/book.png[/img]

Wasn't that swell? I sure as hell had a great time. And you know? We could all learn something from this.

When you figure out what that is, please let me know. I'm still trying to find out on my own.
