[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/yttrisintro.gif[/img]

A young gentleman stands aloft in this dormitory.

He is currently packing a few things up and organizing before he returns to his hive for holiday. Many things to do in such a short amount of time.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/name%20card.gif[/img]

You enter his name post haste, this is no time for shenanigans!

Your name is Yttris Malvoy.

You are classified as a VIT, Very. Important. Troll.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/yttris%20dormatory.png[/img]

As previously mentioned, you are packing up for upcoming holiday.

You are the [b]VALEDICTORIAN[/b] of your class; You take your studies in the [b]ART OF BUTLERY[/b] very seriously. Your class is projected to graduate just after this very well deserved break. But, to you, this is no time to procrastinate on your assigned duties. You are a very busy boy, and busy boy things must be done in order to uphold the care of your Monarchal leaders.

You are a jack of all trades and master of all. You are especially good at playing [b]PIANO[/b] and [b]FENCING[/b]. Your duties are to entertain and to defend your assigned monarch. Who in this case just so happens to be [b]MONARCH SORBAE[/b], the highest king in all of Neorxleas. When you are not entertaining your king you are doing the many other tasks assigned to you as a Butler. Mostly cleaning. 

But right now at this moment you aren't doing anything at all and you are wasting time standing around in this dormatory.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/blissfullystupid.gif[/img]

You walk over to your desk and grab a handful of papers, this specific pile is your essay on historical significance of religious figures and their affect on society today, it's not due any time soon but its always better to have it done in advance incase you need to make adjustments.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/yttrisconcern.png[/img]

In fact most of these papers are completed assignments that aren't due until final term.

And a lot of them have been completed for a while now.

This is the rest of your school sweep in assignments completed.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/you%20should%20take%20a%20break.png[/img]

Now that you think about it, you don't have ANYTHING to do! 

Which is unheard of for a butler, this goes against anything you've ever known. 

If one is not busy, one is not useful, an unuseful butler serves no purpose at all, and if a butler serves no purpose at all, is he even a butler?

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/worryin.png[/img]

Take a break? Are you mad?

Jeez, now that you aren't ignoring your mental health by filling the void with various tasks, the idea of a break sounds stressful. What would you even do with yourself if not serving others or completing paperwork? 

You can only organize a file cabinet or bookshelf so many times before you repeat an organizational method. 

Not like you're one to converse or talk with classmates, since socialization is for the elite, you are to only speak when spoken to.

p.c: Yttris: Equip weapon on wall and swing it around gracefully.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/01.png[/img]

By weapon do you mean this rapier? Well, you would love to but you just simply can't! 

This is a prized possession of yours as it's an heirloom from your ancestors. The two great Malovys before you used this rapier when defending and serving their kings, you aren't quite at the level to wield it yet. Just a few more sweeps of practice you hope, your 2nd ancestor had equipped his shortly after his graduation from what you've been told.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/03.png[/img]

Ah your ancestors, gone but certainly not forgotten, what a perfect time to reminisce your heritage.

Yeoman Malvoy, A highly trained and well respected Plum-blooded butler to the Sorbae lineage. He, just like you, both base your dedication to servitude to your ancestors. He had passed down everything to you in your wriggling perigees so that you will grow into them and take his place as a valued member of the Monarch's court.
 
He has earned many royal ceremonious orders in his name; Most notably the Order of the Garter. A very prestigious award given to only the most honorable of trolls who serve the sovereign. You aspire to be like him and one day earn your royal kudos. 

Like all Malvoys, Yeoman was top of his class in fencing and also most notably in the art of the Épée style. You already are top of your class, but one day you hope to possibly outrank him in his championship streaks.

But that's not who is in the portrait before you. That would be [i][b]The Knight[/b][/i].

[b][i]The Knight[/i][/b] was the first of your caste to begin to dedicate themselves to the Kings Court in the 11th Epoch.

He was the first of the Malvoys, and the first of all trollkind, to earn an Order of the Garter.

A nobleman and military leader who first dedicated himself to fighting against religious zealots. Him and his battalions were undefeated, and conquered lands for the expansion of our Monarchal leaders. His skills are second to none, and outmatches all of the Malvoys. For he is the template in which all Malvoys must strive to be like.

One fateful perigee, he began his moirailegence with a fuchsia who would later be known as THE MONARCH, the first of the Sorbae lineage to rule over Albion and all of Neorxleas. Since this moirailegence, the Malvoys have dedicated themselves to a life of servitude under the Sorbae and will remain faithful, now and forever.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/02.png[/img]

Now that you can do! 

This is what you use to practice in the mean time. In fact this very épée was gifted to you by the monarch himself when you expressed interest in fencing those many sweeps ago. 

The hilt has practically molded to your fins by now, and you wouldn't trade it for the world.

p.c: Yttris: Now swing it around gracefully.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/yttrisfencinggif.png[/img]

Ah don't be mistaken, it might look like swinging but every move made in a fencing duel is precise and purposeful, especially in the style you practice. 

Think of your sword and movements as pawns, and that you are the king on a chess board. You cannot let the opponent get a checkmate. 

The Épée discipline warrants your whole body as a target rather than just your chest and stomach, which adds complexity to the game. One misread step, or a second too late to parry and your king is gone.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/idk/yttrissilly.png[/img]

But for now you can just swing it around.

Although it's more fun to do so un-gracefully, and while jumping around. Oh man your instructor would hate to see this tomfoolery.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/05.png[/img]

Well who doesn't love a good book, relaxing yet still a workout for your mind, you should put your epee away before you get distracted and leave it somewhere you'll forget.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/strifespecyttris.png[/img]

You allocate your epee into your strife specibus. Although it is a training weapon it fits under the 'rapierkind' allocation, which will do for now.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/searchgif.gif[/img]

Most of the books you own are for your studies. Though you do have a favorite in mind that you've been chipping away at.

It doesn't seem to be in your drawer, however. You must have left it in the study hall. You'll have to retrieve that later.

It also seems that someone is trolling you!

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/heartemojipleadface.png[/img]
